title: Retry deployment and resolve deployment-blocking errors

requirements.text: Retry deploying the project and resolve any errors that prevent a successful deploy so the full stack (Motoko canister + React frontend assets) builds and deploys cleanly.
acceptanceCriteria: A fresh deployment attempt completes successfully without errors.
Frontend build completes successfully and loads in the browser after deploy.
If deployment previously failed due to a compile/build/config error, the underlying cause is fixed (not just re-run).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if an upgrade requires state migration.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose those components instead.
nonGoals: Adding new product features unrelated to deployment stability.
Redesigning UI/UX or changing existing user flows unless required to fix the deployment/build.
